data.name: DataPilotFieldAutoShowInfo
desc: contains the auto show information of a DataPilotField.
If enabled, only a number of items with the highest or lowest result values are shown. The other items are hidden automatically.

items.name: DataField
lines: specifies the field where the values to show and select are taken from.

items.name: IsEnabled
lines: specifies whether the AutoShow feature is enabled or not.

items.name: ItemCount
lines: specifies the number of the items to show.

items.name: ShowItemsMode
lines: specifies the mode which items have to be shown.
